description: Under the Crescent Moon - In 2005 Chris Ward filmed one ofthe greatest scenes in the history of porn, a two way pairing betweenFrancois Sagat and Huessein. This scene, like the one shot years before, willbe an instant classic and is one of the porn high points of all time!
